```{r, echo=FALSE}
source("../../R/functions.R")
alumni <- read_mdtable(mdfile = "../../static/database/students.md", skip = 0)
alumni <- alumni[alumni$Exit != "/", c("Name", "Position", "Entry", "Exit", "Supervisor", "Update", "Contact")]
rownames(alumni) <- 1:nrow(alumni)
alumni$Supervisor <- convert_id2link(staff_id = alumni$Supervisor)
DT::datatable(alumni, escape = FALSE)
```
